dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miliaria unius horae".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a sea monster, ships, settlements, and Israelites throughout.
19 pictorial vignettes at top and bottom margins: [Biblical scenes].

Appears in Jansson's Atlas major. Amsterdam, 1658. Vol. X. The map is a reprint of Hondius' Situs Terrae Promissionis, after Adrichom. originally published in the Dutch edition of the author's Atlas novus, 1657-59, in vol. III.
